item.title: Moved. please lock or delet it
item.dc:creator: @jamespk jamespk
item.description:
@jamespk wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:10, topic:429748"][quote author=jamespk link=topic=532428.msg3892410#msg3892410 date=1327002679]
any1 with windows 7 will tell you for fact that u can not port forward with a single port. you must have a program that makes the port E fucking G utorrent… dumb shits, i know all about windows xp vista and 7, xp and vista you can add ports into the firewall in windows 7 you can’t. dont beleave me look it up on google… also like i said give me ponters to inprove yet the posts yous have done dosen’t seem to be helpful more like bitching and saying what can be done, when it can’t. yea thats very helpful.[size=18pt] don’t post unless its useful. [/size]
[/quote]
Once you run your server, your firewall asks if you want to allow it or not. Also you could always turn off the windows firewall, it sucks anyway.[/quote] see thats more helpful lol but yet when i run the server nothing pops up about the firewall and i also have 1 more problem about the ip lol, ive set up a static ip just for my windows 7 computer but, everytime i host it off that ip i get the error about the ip alreay in use but ive set it up to a static ip :s any ideas ( thats why im useing hamachi atm )

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

jamespk:

any1 with windows 7 will tell you for fact that u can not port forward with a single port. you must have a program that makes the port E fucking G utorrent… dumb shits, i know all about windows xp vista and 7, xp and vista you can add ports into the firewall in windows 7 you can’t. dont beleave me look it up on google… also like i said give me ponters to inprove yet the posts yous have done dosen’t seem to be helpful more like bitching and saying what can be done, when it can’t. yea thats very helpful.[size=18pt] don’t post unless its useful. [/size]

Once you run your server, your firewall asks if you want to allow it or not. Also you could always turn off the windows firewall, it sucks anyway.

Read full topic
